div.p: NARRATOR: Because drinking and drug use often occur in social settings, social skills are generally the first things to become state dependent.
GUY: Hey ladies, first drink of the day!
NARRATOR: So we might experience that we are not comfortable in social settings if we are not drinking or using drugs.
NARRATOR: Any time we want to use those social skills comfortably, we have to use enough alcohol or drugs to get back in that window. (the guy tells the ladies a joke)
NARRATOR: Why does this become an issue as I progress from the Yellow to the Orange Phase? Because there are many things happening in my brain... And in my mind.
